text: Lady Chatterley's Lover is a 1981 British French German erotic drama movie directed by Just Jaeckin and based on the 1928 novel of the same name by D. H. Lawrence. It stars Sylvia Kristel, Nicholas Clay, Shane Briant, Ann Mitchell, Elizabeth Spriggs, Anthony Head, Bessie Love and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1981 drama movies Category:1980s erotic movies Category:British drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:German drama movies
title: Lady Chatterley's Lover
